We are developing the materials to use in the classroom, along with some teacher training and support at the school. In order to check the success (or failure) of our project, we need to set up some kind of assessment at the beginning and at the end of the range of planned activities. I am not sure what kind of assessment we could do and I was looking for some suggestions. When the truth of their \ufffd\ufffd\ufffddishonourable\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd union comes to light, the Duke exacts a pitiless revenge. [...] Marta Suarez 2014-07-01T15:09:44+00:00 2014-07-01T15:09:44+00:00 Teaching through film - event at MMU Manchester, 26th July https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ALL-SPANISH;ee853aec.1407 ***Apologies for cross-posting***<br><br>FLAME Research Centre (Film, Languages And Media in Education) would like to invite you to our next event at the Manchester Metropolitan University. The one day mini-conference on "Teaching through Film" will be held on the Saturday 26th of July.<br>This event has been funded by the IHSSR (Institute of Humanities and Social Science Research) with the 'Future Networking Now' grant, which has allowed us to invite academics from different European and UK universities. The event aims to promote networking and knowledge share in relation to the use of audiovisual material for teaching and learning in the [...]
